body.name: Apas 18V Doorbell Transformer, Power Supply Adapter Compatible with Nest Hello Doorbell,Video Doorbell, Video Doorbell Pro , WR2112
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 30 mins
features: COMPABILITY- This doorbell transformer is designed for all versions of Ring door bell. It is compatible with the Ring Video Doorbell, Ring Video Doorbell 2 and Ring Video Doorbell Pro. A constant power solution and no more interrupted operation well offered for you by this Ring doorbell power adapter.
POWER - Power Adapter Input voltage is 120VAC @ 60Hz; Output rating is 18VAC @ 500mA. Meet Ring products’ official specification.

QUALFICATION and DURABILITY - Video Doorbell Power Supply ETL Certificate with high quality construction, the safety product guaranteed for you. This transformer has passed strict tests to ensure optimal and long term performance for its applications.
EASY INSTALLATION -Doorbell Adapter Assemble along the wall from your outlet to the ring doorbell, connect to your doorbell of the Non-Polarized wire. It will take you several minutes.

MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - If, for whatever reason, you are unsatisfied with your purchase you may return it for a full refund. We pride ourselves on high quality product and promise you will have the best
body.description: Compatible with: Doorbells: Ring Video Doorbell Ring Video Doorbell Pro Ring Video Doorbell 2 Skybell doorbell Specification: Input: 120V AC 60Hz 0.2A Output: 18V AC 500mA Cable length: 197inch (500 cm) Installation: A. Just wired the two wire to the ring doorbell and plugged the power transformer into the nearest outlet. B. Once hooked up to your Ring Doorbell, you can see the ring around the doorbell button illuminate white which signifies that the adapter is providing power to the doorbell. Also, you can use the app on your phone that shows you that is hardwired and not running off battery power. Package includes: 1 x Power adapter 1 Bag of cable clips (16 pieces) Note: Please install the power adapter after the battery is fully charged.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works with my Eufy door bell
reviews.reviewText: I needed to put my Eufy doorbell at a location where I did not have access to a VAC line. This power supply adapter worked perfectly. My only wish was the wiring was a few feet longer but that's just due to my specific installation need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes it easy and simple to connect door bell camera
reviews.reviewText: just connect the two connectors and plugin a wall socket power source and voila, it works! I was worried when my current house door bell wire was hard to pull out and it may not able to connect eventually but this connector fixed and resolved/alleviate the issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It worked perfectly for Ring Doorbell Pro.
reviews.reviewText: It worked perfectly for Ring Doorbell Pro, I was worried if it will work and I did, it came with plenty of length in the cord just in case your plug is far. As for how long it last only time will tell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It did the job

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Still trying to get one that works :(
reviews.reviewText: Initial install of the doorbell was a little difficult on brick wall and drilling hole in correct location for power supply. Once installed it worked OK for about 3 months and then the AC adapter died.It was outside of initial return window, but Amazon said they would send a new one.Unfortunately they sent the wrong Apas adapter (24V for irrigation) rather than the 18V adapter for doorbell.Going back and forth with Amazon to get correct part, but meanwhile I don't have a working doorbell due to poor quality and product fulfillment issues.
